oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charles W. Sanford
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brady's National Portrait Gallery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charles W. Sanford, an officer in the Union Army during the Civil War. Published by E. & H.T. Anthony, 501 Broadway, New York from Photographic Negative in Brady's National Portrait Gallery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Military officers; Military uniforms; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
